description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A franchise played by more than 3 million people, now arrived at Xbox Live Indie Games...   In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by pressing A or X.
description.short: A franchise played by more than 3 million people, now arrived at Xbox Live Indie Games...   In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by pressing A or X.
